de.thwildau.app.amber

Class EventListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • de.thwildau.app.amber.EventListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class EventListAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    This class is an adapter for the EventList. It prepares the list and its items for a better usability and access by the user and the program code and for a better display of the individual list objects/items. It fills the list items with the object information at the initial filling. Furthermore it makes methods available for a better management and access.
    Since:
    2015-01-08
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kulla

      • getView

        public android.view.View getView(int position,
                                 android.view.View convertView,
                                 android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        This method gets a view that displays the data at the specified position in the data set. It displays data like type, date of the event, event logo.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the data (item) in the list.
        convertView - The incoming convert view.
        parent - The source viewgroup of the view.
        Returns:
        view The view with the data to display.
